Instead they keep covering their ears and screaming "taking away our guns won't change anything". People wanting better gun control legislation don't necessarily want to take away normal/healthy/stable/non-criminals ability to purchase guns, we just don't want any psycho to be able to walk into any store and purchase a gun in 5 minutes.
